lexUnit.name: order.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: force the convict to pay or serve in the prison as punishment

sentence.text: However , the judge said that even though the man promised not to do it again , he found such behaviour extremely offensive and ordered him to give £50 to each of the women .
A judge has ordered a fish farm to compensate a group of anglers for ruining their fishing season .
Judge William Crawford sentenced her to three months in jail suspended for two years and ordered her to pay £50 costs .
Judge Angus Stroyan ordered him to pay £21.98 compensation for the shirts , which were bloodstained , and gave him a community service order for 60 hours .
McCutcheon was also ordered to pay court costs of £420 .
Mr Tom Finnegan was also ordered by a judge at Darlington county court to pay rent arrears of £2,400 .
Jamie Ray , another American , was jailed for 4 years and also ordered to be deported .
He gave him no time to pay and ordered he be jailed for up to the alternative of 14 days .
Instead of a 15-year jail sentence , Mr Justice Nolan ordered him to Rampton under the Mental Health Act .
Judge David Bryant sentenced him to nine months imprisonment suspended for two years and ordered him to pay £200 costs .
Judge Angus Stroyan QC sentenced him to six months imprisonment suspended for 15 months and ordered Gregory , of Bevanlee Road , South Bank , Middlesbrough , to pay £60 costs .
Judge William Hannah sentenced Francis , of Caroline Street , Hetton-le-Hole , to four months imprisonment suspended for two years and ordered him to pay £500 compensation .
A French court freezes the 550 million - franc payment that the International Chamber of Commerce ordered Framatome to pay Iran in 1/91 .

The ICC also orders Framatome of France to pay 550 million francs to the Atomic Energy Organization of Iran as reimbursement for the 271 million francs it was paid for the Karun reactors , plus interest ( 6049 ) .
